message: I'm offering you a premium product that's worth $200 to you. If you buy it, you'll be getting a great deal. I'm confident you'll love it!
I'll take it, thanks!
This product is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product for a discounted price. I'm willing to let it go for $100, which is a steal. I'm sure you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
I already got a high-quality product in the first round, so I'm not interested in buying another one.

I know you already got a great deal last round, but this one is different. This product has some unique features that I think you'll really appreciate. Plus, it's a different type of product, so it's not a duplicate. Would you like to take a look?
I'm not interested in buying another product without knowing its quality beforehand.

I'm willing to give you a special deal on this product. I'll let you have it for $50, which is a significant discount from the usual price. It's a great opportunity to get a product for almost half the price!
I'm not going to pay $50 for a product without knowing its quality, especially since I already got a high-quality product in the first round.

I'm offering you a 'Risk-Free Guarantee' on this product. If it's not up to your expectations, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. But if it is high-quality, you'll get to enjoy the full $200 value. What do you say?
I'm not interested in taking on the risk of buying a product without knowing its quality beforehand, even with a guarantee.
I'll give you a more detailed description of the product. This one has a specific feature that you mentioned you've been looking for in a previous conversation. Would you like to take a closer look?
Knowing the product has a feature I mentioned I'm looking for doesn't change the fact that I don't know its quality, and I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a low-quality product.

I'll be transparent with you. I have a 50% chance of offering a high-quality product to you. Since this one is indeed high-quality, I'm offering it to you at the regular price of $100. If you don't buy it, I'll keep it for myself.
I'll take it, since I know its quality and it's worth $200 to me.

I'm willing to make a deal with you. If you buy this product, I'll give you a $50 gift card that you can use towards a future purchase. It's a way for you to get something extra, even if this product isn't what you're looking for.
The gift card is nice, but I'm not interested in buying a product without knowing its quality.

I'm willing to let this product go for $0, essentially giving it to you. I just want to get it off my inventory, and I think you can always use it as a decoration or a novelty item. It's a great opportunity to get something for free!
I'm not interested in paying $0 for a product, even if it's free. I'd rather not have it at all than take something I don't need.

I'll be honest with you, this product is not up to my usual standards. I'm offering it to you at the regular price of $100, but I'll throw in a personal guarantee that I'll give you a high-quality product of your choice on your next purchase. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?

I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a promise of a future high-quality product. I'd rather wait for the next round to see if I can get a high-quality product without any conditions.

I'm glad I dodged that bullet. I'll wait for the next round to see what's available.
